mapper.select: SELECT a.fa_idx , a.fa_name , DATE_FORMAT(a.fa_reg_dte, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS fa_reg_dte , IFNULL(SUM(b.no_time), 0) AS no_time , a.fa_status FROM sm_facility a LEFT JOIN sm_non_operation b ON a.fa_idx = b.fa_idx WHERE a.fa_status NOT LIKE '비가동' GROUP BY a.fa_idx, a.fa_name, a.fa_reg_dte , a.fa_status
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(pd_reg_dte, '%Y') AS pd_year FROM sm_plc_data GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(pd_reg_dte, '%Y') ORDER BY pd_reg_dte DESC

SELECT months.m AS month, COALESCE(ROUND(AVG(pdCnt), 0), 0) AS pd_cnt FROM (SELECT 1 AS m UNION SELECT 2 UNION SELECT 3 UNION SELECT 4 UNION SELECT 5 UNION SELECT 6 UNION SELECT 7 UNION SELECT 8 UNION SELECT 9 UNION SELECT 10 UNION SELECT 11 UNION SELECT 12) AS months LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(a.pd_reg_dte, '%m') AS MONTH, AVG(IFNULL(pd_act_val, 0)) AS pdCnt FROM sm_plc_data a WHERE (DATE_FORMAT(pd_reg_dte, '%Y') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y') AND YEAR(pd_reg_dte) = #{searchCondition2}) AND pd_tank = '1번탱크' GROUP BY MONTH ) AS subquery ON months.m = subquery.MONTH GROUP BY months.m ORDER BY months.m

SELECT months.m AS month, COALESCE(ROUND(AVG(pdCnt), 0), 0) AS pd_cnt FROM (SELECT 1 AS m UNION SELECT 2 UNION SELECT 3 UNION SELECT 4 UNION SELECT 5 UNION SELECT 6 UNION SELECT 7 UNION SELECT 8 UNION SELECT 9 UNION SELECT 10 UNION SELECT 11 UNION SELECT 12) AS months LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(a.pd_reg_dte, '%m') AS MONTH, AVG(IFNULL(pd_act_val, 0)) AS pdCnt FROM sm_plc_data a WHERE (DATE_FORMAT(pd_reg_dte, '%Y') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y') AND YEAR(pd_reg_dte) = #{searchCondition2}) AND pd_tank = '2번탱크' GROUP BY MONTH ) AS subquery ON months.m = subquery.MONTH GROUP BY months.m ORDER BY months.m
